name: Of Ice and Men
description:
NOTE: This is only a small prototype of a much larger idea! There may/will be bugs that you find, any feedback will generously help us in development!

Of Ice and Men is a third-person action-adventure exploration game where the player must search for his missing tribes-people whilst attempting to survive the rapidly oncoming Ice Age. The player must traverse  the changing climate of the jungle, through caves, solving puzzles in temples and fending off rival tribes (who may also be cannibals!).
